_description: InputBar layout configuration - dimensions, spacing, and positioning that work across all themes

container._comment: Main input bar container positioning and dimensions

positioning._purpose: Where the input bar appears on screen
positioning._bottomNote: Distance from screen bottom. Increase = more space below input bar
positioning._zIndexNote: Stacking order. Higher = appears above more elements

dimensions._purpose: Input bar size at different screen sizes
dimensions._defaultNote: Width on mobile/small screens. Standard width for narrow viewports
dimensions._largeNote: Width on desktop screens. Larger for better desktop experience
dimensions._maxNote: Never exceeds viewport width minus padding. Prevents horizontal overflow
dimensions._minHeightNote: Minimum container height. Ensures consistent baseline size
dimensions._breakpointNote: Screen width where layout switches from mobile to desktop sizing

spacing._paddingNote: Internal space around content. Increase = more breathing room
spacing._gridGapNote: Space between file zone, text input, and controls. Affects visual separation

spacing._zonePaddingNote: Internal padding of file zone. Increase = more space around file previews
spacing._itemGapNote: Space between individual file previews. Affects file density

filePreview._previewPaddingNote: Space inside each file preview card
filePreview._minWidthNote: Minimum file preview width. Ensures readable file names
filePreview._maxWidthNote: Maximum file preview width. Prevents oversized previews
filePreview._imageSizeNote: Size of image thumbnails in file previews

removeButton._purpose: File removal X button positioning and size
removeButton._buttonSizeNote: X button dimensions. Larger = easier to click
removeButton._positionNote: Button offset from preview corner. Negative values = outside the preview

autoResize._lineHeightNote: Height of single text line. Must match CSS line-height exactly
autoResize._minHeightNote: Minimum input height (1 line). Must equal lineHeight
autoResize._maxHeightNote: Maximum input height (12 lines). Must equal lineHeight ร maxLines
autoResize._maxLinesNote: Maximum visible lines before scrolling. Calculate: maxHeight รท lineHeight

typography._fontSizeNote: Main text size. Affects readability and input density
typography._fontFamilyNote: Font family for text input. system-ui uses OS default

controlsRow._comment: Bottom controls row layout and spacing

layout._controlsGapNote: Space between controls (plus button, dropdowns, indicator)

plusButton._plusPaddingNote: Clickable area around plus icon. Increase = easier to click
plusButton._plusRadiusNote: Corner roundness of button hover area

icon._iconSizeNote: Plus icon dimensions. Increase = more prominent add button

dropdownTrigger._dropdownFontNote: Text size for picker labels. Affects picker prominence
dropdownTrigger._dropdownRadiusNote: Corner roundness of dropdown hover area

chevron._chevronSizeNote: Arrow icon size. Increase = more visible dropdown indicator

statusIndicator._indicatorSizeNote: Status dot diameter. Increase = more prominent status

menu._menuWidthNote: Dropdown menu width. Increase = more room for long option names
menu._menuMarginNote: Space between dropdown and trigger button

item._itemPaddingNote: Space inside each dropdown option. Affects clickability

sectionHeader._headerPaddingNote: Space around section headers. Less bottom padding than items
sectionHeader._headerFontNote: Section header text size. Smaller than items for hierarchy

modelRow._purpose: Special styling for model options with name + ID

modelId._modelIdNote: Model API ID size. Smaller for less prominence
modelId._modelIdMarginNote: Space between model name and ID

stencils._comment: Horizontal lines extending from input bar

positioning._purpose: Where stencil lines appear relative to input bar
positioning._stencilBottomNote: Distance from screen bottom. Must align with input bar center
positioning._stencilHeightNote: Line thickness. Increase = more prominent framing lines
positioning._stencilZNote: Same as input bar to appear at same layer

dimensions._defaultWidthNote: Mobile stencil width. Must match container defaultWidth
dimensions._largeWidthNote: Desktop stencil width. Must match container largeScreenWidth
dimensions._minWidthNote: Minimum visible line length. Ensures always visible

animation._purpose: Animation durations that affect layout and spacing
animation._resizeNote: Text input height change speed. Slower = smoother resize
